TextBlock.Text: IRNA: Is it just me or has Darvy been acting weird lately?
OYVAR: Of course. He gets antsy like that whenever he has a deep secret.
OYVAR: I'd personally love to know what it is, but I'll respect his privacy.
DARVY: <color=red>(faintly whispering in the background)</color> This changes everything I knew... who would've known Ginth was a...
